ygData.subject: Re: RE: Finally 200
ygData.msgSnippet: No friend... i not flaming you .. i jsut have done lots or reading on this...but .. i wish you luck .. and your right only the code writer really knows the
ygData.messageBody:
No friend... i not flaming you .. i jsut have done lots or reading on
this...but .. i wish you luck .. and your right only the code writer really
knows the fact of it... but to help you out .. i have attached a link to
rangers glade that help explaine which skills do what... it is a very widly
held knowldge.. and it is also stated in many of Verants own docunments that
these skil act in the way they are stated on this rangers glade web site..

good hunting and Please .. i not flaming anyone..
this group is to help each other ... not to make peeps mad )

take it easy
karvar blackhawk of bristlebane
grandmaster fletcher
lvl 35 ranger
----- Original Message -----
From: Murr Rockstroh <mrockstr@...>
To: <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 3:37 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Fletchers] RE: Finally 200


> From: "Murr Rockstroh" <mrockstr@...>
>
> Hehe funny, you say "It is a fact" - ok, whatever, I am not going to get
> into a flame war about this, but would be interested to know where you get
> this "Fact" from..... I was merely offering some advice that might help
you
> see something from a different angle. I had a "Wis" suit and was able to
> get my Wisdom up to 98 with it, and had about a 50 percent failure rate on
> Darkwoods (this is all at my current skill level of 196 since it has not
> gone up in 4 months). I ditched my Wis gear to make room for Warrior gear
I
> was starting to acquire. At that point my failure rated started to
drop....
> Now another thing that has gone up, other than my dexterity is my level,
it
> might even be possible that has something to do with it as well.
>
> Vapn, Master Fletcher, Povar
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cooper, Mark [mailto:blackhawk@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 2:27 PM
> To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] RE: Finally 200
>
>
> From: blackhawk@... (Cooper, Mark)
>
> HEHE.. ok i don't mind ifyou want to dissagree... but wis is direclty tied
> to rate of success... and 33% fail of darkwood sends a cool shiver down my
> spine... i hope i get that rich that 33% fail on dark wood is no big
deal..
> and there is no ned to argue about wis it is a fact.. but if you liketo go
> with out .. no problem... i do not fight with my wis stuff on but i do
> fletch with it.. i want my failures to be no more that 5% at max 10%.. so
i
> go looking for more wis items )
>
> good fletching to you
>
> karvar blackhawk
> grand master fletcher lvl 200
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Murr Rockstroh <mrockstr@...>
> To: <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 3:05 PM
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Fletchers] RE: Finally 200
>
>
> > From: "Murr Rockstroh" <mrockstr@...>
> >
> > I am going to have to disagree here about the Wisdom thing and
> failures.....
> > This is something that I first heard in Beta.... My wisdom is 74, and
my
> > Dex is 117, and I don't fail much on Darkwoods (about 33 percent). I
> think
> > that different skills might take different attributes for success.... My
> Int
> > is 102 anyways (no suit needed, I am a gnome)
> >
> > Vapn Maistre, Master Fletcher, Povar
> > Level 33 Warrior
> >
